thread.title: Guangzhou Baiyunshan Pharma To Invest 800 Mln Yuan Each In Two Health Industry Funds

author: Reuters Editorial
title: Guangzhou Baiyunshan Pharma To Invest 800 Mln Yuan Each In Two Health Industry Funds

organizations.name: guangzhou baiyunshan pharmaceutical holdings co ltd

text:
Feb 13 (Reuters) - Guangzhou Baiyunshan Pharmaceutical Holdings Co Ltd:
* SAYS IT PLANS TO SET UP TWO INVESTMENT JVS AND TO INVEST UP TO 800 MILLION YUAN ($126.19 million) EACH IN TWO HEALTH INDUSTRY FUNDS Source text in Chinese: bit.ly/2HaSygj ; bit.ly/2suOXGJ Further company coverage: ($1 = 6.3398 Chinese yuan renminbi) (Reporting by Hong Kong newsroom)
Our Standards: The Thomson Reuters Trust Principles.
